extendedInfo.description: Sleep Ambience is a white noise app that allows you to customise background sounds to listen to while relaxing or going to sleep. If you like sleeping to the soothing sound of a river, or the beautiful songs of birds, then Sleep Ambience is for you!FEATURES:â¢ 160 unique soundsâ¢ Completely free! No ads!â¢ 5 sound groups (more to come):Forest, City, Meditation, House, BeachCustomisable soundsâ¢ Create your own custom tracks from any number of included soundsâ¢ Change the volume of each sound individuallyâ¢ Change how frequently intermittent sounds playâ¢  Track libraryUpload your favourite tracks to the built-in free cloud library, and download tracks that others have created!â¢  Sleep timerSo you don't have to worry about turning off Sleep Ambience when you've fallen asleep!â¢  Wake-up alarmSo you can wake to the sound of your tracks!Explanation of permissionsâ¢ Read phone status and identity - This is used so Sleep Ambience can be alerted when a phone call is incoming so it can stop any tracks playing.â¢ Full network access - This is used for connecting to the track library and anonymous error and analytical reporting.â¢ Prevent phone from sleeping - This is used to keep the screen on while the wake-up alarm is sounding.NOTE: Some Android devices are notorious for noticeable gaps with sound loops. This is a problem with Android, not Sleep Ambience.If you suffer from insomnia, would like a relaxing atmosphere for yoga or meditation, or would just like to be serenaded by crickets or rain while you nap, youâve come to the right place. This app contains plenty of sounds to remind you of relaxing by the beach on a summer holiday or enjoying the thunder and lightning of a beautiful storm. With hundreds of sounds from nature/home providing an atmosphere, peaceful sleep is moments away.Just some of the included sounds:Airport, chant, choir, bat, Batucada, helicopter, train, beehive, bell, blender, boat, bus, waves, campfire, car, horn, cat, dog, cicada, city, clock, chime, dryer, construction, coyote, crane, crickets, woods, deer, fan, fireworks, dolphin, doorbell, piano, seaside, faucet, drip, fireplace, foghorn, footsteps, sand, stream, fountain, fridge, frog, night, fulmar, truck, gas, fire, goose, grackle, grandfather clock, seagulls, traffic, jackhammer, Japanese flute, kookaburra, Kruger park, lawn mower, loon, microwave, mistral, birds, mowing, nightingale, orca, owl, pile driver, rainforest, samba, scuba, siren, river, snore, splash, sprinkler, steam ship, stormy sea, television static, vacuum cleaner, washing machine, washer, whale, whistle, wind, chimes, woodpeckerKeywords:nature relax white noise rain atmosphere storm river bug bugs crickets peaceful beach insomnia nap yoga meditation country instruments piano waves wave lightning thunder camping

reviews.title: Wonderful app!
reviews.comment: I love this app, I use it every night as I sleep, I also use it to meditate....wonderful options! No problems and I\'ve had it and used it every day for a few months now! Thank you so much!
reviews.author: Danica Hively

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app is a keeper!  Multiple relaxing tracks plus an alarm AND you can use the sleep timer. Great and beneficial in helping me relax.
reviews.author: Shannon Young

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I\'m really happy with this app.   The UI is excellent and it has great selection of sounds. The ability to create and share new tracks is awesome!
reviews.author: Rob Melgar

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: So grateful for that I finally found an app that can relax my mind and soul, thank you!
reviews.author: Guat Ling Tan

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Got rid of another app for this one because it is 10x better. The layout is beautiful, clean and simple. The quality of the sounds is wonderful. You can create your own sounds. And there\'s a sleep timer. Great free app!
reviews.author: Treece G

reviews.title: Variable white noise sound effector
reviews.comment: Could work well except loud neighbor
reviews.author: Peter Hamilton

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I have used several different apps trying to find the perfect noise closest to a realistic fan, being able to mix certain sounds is perfect, and the meditation tracks are incrediable as well, a must download! Though the ui took some getting used to and I don\'t like that I have to put my phone in to airplane mode to shut off notification sounds.
reviews.author: Hope Ehlert-Sheehan

reviews.title: The best app out there for rain,and so many other sounds of nature
reviews.comment: I am so, so, happy I ran across this app its gr8 I love this app! Its so versatile I can make my own sounds, or listen to other users sound. Great white noise it has it all. Love it!
reviews.author: roxanne brazziel

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Drowns out noisy neighbors and annoying house mates!
reviews.author: shell e

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: I love that you are encouraged to create your own tracks and upload them so other users can use them.
reviews.author: nudger1965

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Luv it. Just needs a bigger sound library
reviews.author: gary wilders

reviews.title: Samsung GN2
reviews.comment: Lots of variety & creativity to get the perfect sound! One of the best thus far!
reviews.author: Al NISA RUSSELL

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I fall asleep to it every night \"(^\342\200\242^)\"
reviews.author: Tammy Stroud

reviews.comment: Really helps me rest. Large selection. Beautiful!
reviews.author: Karen Greene

reviews.title: Relaxing sounds
reviews.comment: My only complaint is that I cannot turn on the sleep timer so the sounds stop after sleep.
reviews.author: Amber Brill

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I have tried many apps like this but this is the best.  favorites are the crickets and frogs, sounds are actually good and do not sound fake. Love how I can make my own mix of sounds!!
reviews.author: morgan landon

reviews.title: Love It!!
reviews.comment: I luv dis app... Evry nite im twisting n twerlng in bed tryng to sleep but cnt... Since i have strtng listening to dis i fall asleep instantly.... Must download. !!!!!!!
reviews.author: Hareem Faiz

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Best of there. ?. Free. ? Mix your own from there library of sounds. Want rain plus birds? Click it and here it. Oh,  no ads
reviews.author: Drew Vale
